reviewText:
This is a documentary sort of movie. If you are looking for the "Hatchet "
based movie, it is Cry IN the Wild. And it does have one "nude" scene
where Brian strips down and dives off a ledge into the lake below.
Don't remember that in the book.
This was supposed to be the movie that is taken after the book Hatchet.  It was a documentary of tracking wolves.  It had nothing to do with the book.
This is a great movie by a great man!  The scenery is outstanding.  I knew Bill Mason & am not surprised at the excellent movies he has made.
